alert.note: Alert for Eastern Panhandle, Crescent Lake NWR (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 18 at 1:46PM CDT until July 19 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT TUESDAY FOR WIND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND THE THREAT FOR DRY THUNDERSTORMS FOR THE EASTERN NEBRASKA PANHANDLE...WESTERN SANDHILLS AND PORTIONS OF FAR SOUTHWESTERN NEBRASKA... * Affected Area...In NEZ204...Fire Weather Zone 204 Eastern Panhandle/Crescent Lake NWR. * Winds...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 30 mph today and northwest at 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 30 mph Tuesday. * Relative Humidity...As low as 13 percent. * Lightning...Isolated thunderstorms capable of dry lightning may develop today. * Impacts...Any fire starts will be difficult or impossible to contain.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
